inclusion.criterion: confirmed pathologic diagnosis of breast cancer which is metastatic and for which capecitabine is a reasonable treatment option
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ARMS C & D: Histologically confirmed HER2+ breast cancer: IHC 3+ or fluorescence in situ hybridization [FISH] amplified; by clinical assay on either primary or metastatic tumor
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Brain metastases permitted in Arms A and B if: CNS-directed treatment has been given; No CNS-directed therapy for the past 3 months, including glucocorticoids; AND CNS disease has been clinically and radiographically stable for at least 8 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Measurable or non-measurable (but evaluable) disease as defined via RECIST 1.1
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal organ and marrow function as defined below: Absolute neutrophil count ≥1,500/μL; Platelets ≥100,000/μL; Hemoglobin ≥8.5g/dL
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Receiving concurrent endocrine, cytotoxic, or biologic agent(s) or within time limits specified above prior to study day 1
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Received wide field radiotherapy ≤4 weeks, or SRS or gamma knife for brain metastasis ≤ 2 weeks or limited field radiation for palliation ≤2 weeks prior to starting either BYL719 or BKM120 or have not recovered from side effects of such therapy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment with a PI3K inhibitor
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis, which may be relevant to trial eligibility. Patient also has recent antibx use in the last month on prior admission.
